page.topic: Create Email to Send to User with Password Dialog
page.description: The Create Email to Send to User with Password dialog defines the template for an email to send to a user who has requested lost login information and entered the required information on the Lost Password page. The host computer must be configured to send email.

step.description: Enter the email subject data into the Subject text box.

Enter text and and {Password} placeholder into the Body text box control. The application will replace {UserEmail} and {Password} with the user's email address and actual password when it sends the email.
